candidates.notes: For the song "Beauty and the Beast". Howard Ashman's nomination and award were posthumous. His partner Bill Lauch accepted the award on his behalf.
For the song "Be Our Guest". Howard Ashman's nomination was posthumous.
For the song "Belle". Howard Ashman's nomination was posthumous.
For the song "(Everything I Do) I Do It for You".

The Silence of the Lambs (1991) became the third film in Academy history to win the "Big Five" Academy Awards for producing, directing, acting, and screenwriting following It Happened One Night (1934) and One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest (1975).
Beauty and the Beast (1991) became the very first full-length animated feature film in cinema history to be nominated for the Academy Award for Best Picture.

name: Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material Previously Produced or Published

candidates.notes: Carol Sobieski's nomination was posthumous, for she died from liver disease the year before the film's release.
